rusty_key.name: Rusty Key
rusty_key.description: Old and corroded, but it might still work.

map02_key.name: Map02 Key
map02_key.description: Required to unlock the path to the next map.

ruin_key.name: Ruin Key
ruin_key.description: Opens the path to deeper ruins.

forked_key.name: Forked Key
forked_key.description: Opens a chest at the crossroads.

ancient_scroll.name: Ancient Scroll
ancient_scroll.description: Faded text hints at forgotten lore.

health_amulet.name: Health Amulet
health_amulet.description: Permanently increases max HP when found.

blueprint_amulet.name: Blueprint: Amulet
blueprint_amulet.description: Instructions for crafting a health amulet

blueprint_health_amulet.name: Blueprint: Health Amulet
blueprint_health_amulet.description: A parchment detailing how to fuse potions into an amulet

commander_badge.name: Commander Badge
commander_badge.description: Proof of defeating the scout commander.

scout_blade.name: Scout Blade
scout_blade.description: A light blade once wielded by a goblin scout.

cracked_helmet.name: Cracked Helmet
cracked_helmet.description: Offers minimal protection despite the damage.

armor_piece.name: Armor Piece
armor_piece.description: A chunk of metal that can be forged into protection.

defense_potion_I.name: Defense Potion I
defense_potion_I.description: Increases defense by 1 for this fight.

faded_blade.name: Faded Blade
faded_blade.description: A worn weapon once carried by Vaelin. Use in battle to strike harder.

arcane_crystal.name: Arcane Crystal
arcane_crystal.description: A crystal infused with raw arcana.

faded_letter.name: Faded Letter
faded_letter.description: The writing is smudged but hints at a forgotten past.

old_coin.name: Old Coin
old_coin.description: A weathered coin from ages past.

recall_shard.name: Recall Shard
recall_shard.description: A fragment pulsing with lost memory.

sentry_plating.name: Sentry Plating
sentry_plating.description: Metal scrap useful for future armor crafting.

chaos_organ.name: Chaos Organ
chaos_organ.description: Rare organ from rift creatures used in potent fusions.

void_residue.name: Void Residue
void_residue.description: Traded among scholars for high-level crafting.

focus_ring.name: Focus Ring
focus_ring.description: Slightly improves the accuracy of all skills.

goblin_bow.name: Goblin Bow
goblin_bow.description: A crude bow taken from a goblin archer.

ward_leaf.name: Ward Leaf
ward_leaf.description: Used later for crafting defense-enhancing items.

old_scroll.name: Old Scroll
old_scroll.description: Triggers hidden dialogue with a future ally.

arcane_spark.name: Arcane Spark
arcane_spark.description: Unleashes a burst damaging all foes once per battle.

crystal_dust.name: Crystal Dust
crystal_dust.description: Required by later crafting recipe for crystalline armor

psy_fiber.name: Psy Fiber
psy_fiber.description: Component in neural implants or debuff skills (future)

rift_eye.name: Rift Eye
rift_eye.description: May be used in map06 to open sealed psychic gate

memory_gem.name: Memory Gem
memory_gem.description: May be socketed (future mechanic) or traded for skill token

rift_stone.name: Rift Stone
rift_stone.description: A shard humming with unstable dimensional energy.
